quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday. – Brian Tracy
fact: In Aspen Colorado, you can have a maximum income of $104,000 and still receive government subsidized housing.

joke: My sister bet me $15 that I couldn't build a car out of spaghetti. You should have seen the look on her face as I drove pasta.
